name: code-flattener
description: Transform your codebase into a perfectly structured markdown document - Boost AI coding assistants with full context, simplify code reviews, and share your projects effortlessly

codeFlattener.outputFolder.description: Name of the folder where flattened source code will be saved

codeFlattener.excludePatterns.description: Patterns to exclude from processing (glob format)

codeFlattener.includePatterns.description: Patterns to include in processing (glob format). If empty, all files will be processed except those matching exclude patterns

codeFlattener.maxFileSizeBytes.description: Maximum file size in bytes for analysis (default: 10MB)

codeFlattener.maxOutputFileSizeBytes.description: Maximum output file size in bytes before rotation (default: 5MB)

codeFlattener.respectGitignore.description: Whether to respect the project's .gitignore file for file exclusions

codeFlattener.enableSemanticCompression.description: Enable semantic compression to optimize output for LLMs by removing redundant content

codeFlattener.enhancedTableOfContents.description: Generate an enhanced table of contents with more detail for better navigation

codeFlattener.prioritizeImportantFiles.description: Prioritize important files (like main entry points, config files) in the output

codeFlattener.visualizationLevel.description: Level of detail for code relationship visualizations (fixed at basic level for optimal performance)

codeFlattener.promptForAdditionalExclusi.description: Whether to prompt the user for additional files/patterns to exclude at runtime

author: GTuritto
